title: Man in Ethiopia
creator_credit: Allegro Film Productions and ETO Films
brief_description: Shows the interwoven cultures of primitive and modern people in Ethiopia and seeks to relate the importance of tradition in the Judeo-Christian religion which these African people so zealously follow.
description: Shows the interwoven cultures of primitive and modern people in Ethiopia and seeks to relate the importance of tradition in the Judeo-Christian religion which these African people so zealously follow.
